The Splugen pass is usually closed between November and April. If the pass is closed, Madesimo can only be reached from Chiavenna.

There is a good Bus and train connection from Milan and Bergamo and from the Milan airports.
There is a "taxi share" scheme that provides a taxi from the airport to the village as well.
The area around the Madesimo area is quite vast and mountainous. In winter time, winter tires and/or snow chains may be required.

Madesimo is part of the Valchiavenna skiing area (1550-2950m) with 58 km of slopes. As such, it is one of the smaller ski resorts in the Alps. It is quite popular amongst Italians but less well known in other European countries. In weekends it is usually very busy with locals. However, on weekdays it can be very quiet even during holidays because of the Italian holiday system.
To access the skiing area, it is not necessary to drive all the way to Madesimo. You can leave your car in Campodolcino (1000M), from where the funicolare will bring you all the way up to Mota at 1700m. The parking in Campodolcino is free on weekdays and it is possible to rent skis and buy a ski pass at the valley station of the funicolare. From Mota, all of the skiing area can be reached.

In winter the roads may be entirely blocked with snow, so to reach some of the frazione may require a set of touring or cross country skis.

As a popular ski resort for both tourists and locals to the area, Madesimo offers various experiences that provide tourists with the opportunity to experience the winter sports of the Alps and one of these options is snow mobiling. One can take advantage of this through the use of Team Extreme: a snow mobiling company local to the Madesimo area. During the last few years more and more people have made a point of becoming part of Team Extreme. In accordance with local laws and regulations, the snow mobile tours are based off of safety restrictions and offer families, as well as individuals(Private Tours are available), an enjoyable experience. each trip takes place along prepared tracks which
meander along the Andossi ridge linking Madesimo with it’s neighbour Montespluga.Other than individual outings
on snowmobile, there are also possibilities of group excursions along with an escort who will provide all the necessary support. The tracks follow the slopes of valley sides and are suitable even for the inexperienced ‘pilot’. Importantly the sign-posting and well-maintained trails guarantee the safety of all concerned.
